name: Ancient Ruins
description: A set of crumbling stone structures hidden deep in the forest. Legends say these ruins belonged to the Ancients, long before the clans formed. Strange markings hint at forgotten knowledge, powerful herbs, and secret passageways.

runes.combat_boost: Increases battle skill temporarily when meditated upon
runes.healing_boost: Improves medicine cat effectiveness for the next day
runes.vision_boost: Enhances stealth and detection for 2 patrols

quests.name: First Step into the Ruins
quests.description: Explore the entrance and report back to your clan.

quests.name: Decipher the Runes
quests.description: Solve the runic puzzle inside the deepest chamber to unlock hidden herbs.
